about1: Hello, I am Ujjesha Shankar currently in 7th Semester (as of
about2: ), pursuing my BTech in Computer Science from KIIT University, Bhubaneshwar, Odisha.
about3: I am an aspiring web developer with a strong passion for software development and a growing portfolio of experience. I have done Salesforce Developer Certification Course from SmartBridge (AICTE Approved). Previosly I had completed a remote internship with CODSoft, where I gained hands-on experience in web development, honing my skills in building dynamic and user-friendly websites. My goal is to continually improve and contribute to innovative projects, staying up to date with the latest technologies and trends in the industry. I am committed to becoming a professional in the field and am eager to leverage my knowledge to create impactful digital solutions.

Outside of work, I have a deep love for Korean culture, especially K-pop and K-dramas, which fuel my creativity and provide endless inspiration. I enjoy spending time with friends, exploring different cuisines, and relaxing at the beach whenever I can. These hobbies balance my professional ambitions, allowing me to stay refreshed and energized.
